TopicTitle: YouTube LP'er and longtime KSP fan here!

Articles.Content:
Hey guys! I'm Zabuza825 and I've been a longtime fan of KSP. Been playing it since it was free, and dished out the money as soon as I found out it was going payed. Decided to join the forum a while back when I was originally going to upload some videos of me playing KSP, but that fell through.... so now I'm back!

I don't even think I introduced myself last time so, hello all!

Hey guys! I'm Zabuza825 and I've been a longtime fan of KSP. Been playing it since it was free, and dished out the money as soon as I found out it was going payed. Decided to join the forum a while back when I was originally going to upload some videos of me playing KSP, but that fell through.... so now I'm back!

I don't even think I introduced myself last time so, hello all!

Welcome fellow youtuberrrR !

Me myself and SG4tw in youtube, nice to meet you
Welcome, it's brilliant to see so many people making videos!
